issue.title: [CF 787] New condition to check: Quest completion status
issue.body:
Hello,

I would appreciate if I could check whether I had already completed certain repeatable quests (weekly pickup of mogu runes of fate, the quests underlying weekly world boss looting, etc,) This should be easily doable by checking quest IDs.

Thanks*G


> Posted by CurseForge user Goneril | Imported from CurseForge issue #787 | Raw

comments.body:
Done in r763.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
